programme.title: Live: College Basketball Live Scoreboard
programme.desc: All the latest scores and highlights from college basketball.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: Grand Canyon (2-0) and Arizona State (2-1) meet at the Footprint Center. The Phoenix-area rivals last met in 2021, with the Sun Devils beating the Lopes 67-62. Grand Canyon senior JaKobe Coles is averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds through two wins.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts travel to a small town over Christmas, and while pretending to get along for the sake of appearances, they slowly discover there is more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to organize the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: Take Me Back for Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas wish grants Renée the successful life she's always dreamed of -- except she finds herself no longer married to her beloved husband.

programme.title: Holiday Road
programme.desc: Stranded at an airport, a group of holiday travelers agrees to rent a van for a road trip to Denver. When their unexpected journey leads them into uncharted territory, they must navigate a series of misadventures that brings them closer together.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Ten men compete in a series of festive challenges that will showcase their acting chops and their holiday spirit; Jonathan Bennett hosts while these lovable guys vie to become the next Hallmark leading man.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Ten men compete in a series of festive challenges that will showcase their acting chops and their holiday spirit; Jonathan Bennett hosts while these lovable guys vie to become the next Hallmark leading man.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Sister Swap: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Two sisters find a new sense of purpose and discover what they both truly need in life during the holidays.

programme.title: Crashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: Maggie and Sam are crashing Christmas. When he proposes that they team up against his sister's perfect Christmas, neither of them are prepared for the blended family challenges that lie ahead.

programme.title: Our Christmas Mural
programme.desc: Returning home for Christmas, a single mother teams up with a teacher to create a mural for a holiday contest.

programme.title: The Holiday Sitter
programme.desc: Sam is a workaholic bachelor who's babysitting his niece and nephew during the holidays. Completely out of his element, he recruits help from a handsome neighbor and soon finds himself in an unexpected romance.

programme.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria hopes being selected for Sterling Masters' Big Holiday Adventure will save Christmas in Midway. Little does she know that Alex Bartlett is the voice behind Sterling Masters.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: The queen (Jane Seymour) of Cordinia schemes to break up her royal son's (Stephen Hagan) romance with a seamstress (Lacey Chabert) from Philadelphia.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: An actress heads to the Christmas-obsessed town of Homestead, Iowa, to shoot a holiday-themed movie. She is shocked when a romance blooms with Matt, a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: A World Record Christmas
programme.desc: An boy with autism is determined to break a Guinness World Record by stacking 1,400 blocks. In the spirit of the holiday, his mother and stepfather organize a fundraiser to give the townspeople an opportunity to decorate and donate a block.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: Christmas Connection
programme.desc: Sydney is tasked with looking after Leah, an unaccompanied minor. After Leah is safely delivered, Sydney finds a package Leah left behind and decides to deliver it. When she misses her connection, she is invited to spend the holidays with them.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers meet when they help an elderly woman find her lost Christmas savings. Thanks to fate and Christmas magic, they also find something they were both missing: true love.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: A man and a woman from rival families try to mend their respective fathers' decades-old feud. They soon find romance along the way as they compete in a holiday decorating contest.

programme.title: A Song for Christmas
programme.desc: A pop star becomes stranded in a small town in the dead of winter and finds refuge at a family's beleaguered dairy farm.

programme.title: Christmas Incorporated
programme.desc: Riley lands an assistant position for a headstrong socialite who is being forced to play Scrooge and close one of his factories just weeks before Christmas. Riley slowly convinces him to visit the town and hatches a plan to keep the factory afloat.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A former tour guide meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: A Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When her boss steals her idea for their magazine's cover story, Emma searches for a Christmas miracle to write about with the help of her son and the handsome staff photographer.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Violinist Beth returns home after the recent death of her mother and tutors the daughter of a reclusive country music star to prepare her for the upcoming holiday concert.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: Basketball Stories
programme.desc: From breaking backboards to topping the rap charts, Shaquille O'Neal's rookie season was both dominant and memorable. Patrick Ewing, Alonzo Mourning, Charles Barkley, and many more share stories and highlights of Shaq's first year in the NBA.

programme.title: Basketball Stories
programme.sub-title: 20 Years of Las Vegas Summer League
programme.desc: The rise of Summer League in Las Vegas is chronicled in a celebration of 20 years for the NBA's signature event, as superstars such as Stephen Curry, Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo would get their start in the Vegas Summer League.

programme.title: Vince Carter: The Interview
programme.desc: Vince Carter, an eight-time NBA All-Star, sits down for an exclusive one-on-one interview and discusses his 2000 Slam Dunk performance, his playing days with the Toronto Raptors, and more.

programme.title: Basketball Stories: Sir Charles & The Doctor
programme.desc: Two members of the NBA 75th Anniversary Team - Charles Barkley and Julius "Dr. J." Erving - are featured in this basketball documentary.

programme.title: David Stern: 30 Years
programme.desc: Ernie Johnson sits down with David Stern and discuss his tenure as Commissioner of the NBA.
